thread.title: DJ Zinhle isn't 'still bitter' over AKA split: 'I'm definitely over it'
thread.title_full: DJ Zinhle isn't 'still bitter' over AKA split: 'I'm definitely over it'

title: DJ Zinhle isn't 'still bitter' over AKA split: 'I'm definitely over it'
text:
Lerato Kganyago defends Zinhle against 'trolls' DJ Zinhle has responded to suggestions that she is still hung up on her split from with rapper AKA, telling her haters that she is over the heartbreak, but will never stop talking about her past. 
The popular musician found herself trending over the weekend after some haters accused her of still talking about her relationship with AKA because she was bitter and not yet over the heartbreak. IN MEMES: Eish! Double (love) troubles for twins on Date My Family 
They were touched by Zinhle's comments about getting over her romance with AKA and wanting to have more kids in the future. 
Zinhle was tired of the insults being hurdled at her and took to Twitter to set a few things straight. Yes, I do want more kids. Loads!
